title: Chattanooga Mayor Calls for Washington Response
itunes:title: Chattanooga Mayor Calls for Washington Response
description:
Chattanooga Mayor Andy Berke discusses how the U.S. city is handling the spread of the coronavirus. He says the federal government needs to act with stimulus to offset the economic impact.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
